common.noMatches: Ga go na tse di tshwanang

profile.title: Profailo ya Modirisi
profile.mustLogin: O tshwanetse go tsena (sign in) go bona ditlhophiso.
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Bontsha molaetsa wa ntlha le o o fetotsweng
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Bontsha wa ntlha pelenyana le phetolelo
profile.autoDeleteSeconds: Metsotswana go fitlha e phimolwa ka boyona
profile.saveError: Phoso: Ga e a kgona go boloka ditlhophiso
profile.noPrivateKey: Ga go na senotlolo sa poraefete mo sedirisong seno go se romela.
profile.backupDownloaded: Bekapo e e sirilweng e kopolotswe.
profile.importSuccess: Senotlolo sa poraefete se tsentswe mo sedirisong seno.
profile.importFailed: Go retetse go tsenya senotlolo (khunololamoraba e phoso kgotsa faele e senyegile).
profile.keysRotated: Dinotlolo tse dintsha di agilwe mme senotlolo sa setšhaba sa rometswe.
profile.importKey: Tsenya bekapo ya senotlolo se se sirilweng
profile.keyDisclaimer: Senotlolo sa gago sa poraefete ga se tswe mo sedirising seno. Romela kopi e e sireleditsweng ka khunololamoraba go kgona go e busetsa mo sedirisong se sengwe.
profile.themeFreeNotice: O mo Morerong wa Mahala—dirisa dikgetho tsa Letsatsi/Ngwedi fa tlase. Ntšhwafatsa go bula metheme e mentsi.
profile.backupTitle: Dibekapo tse di Sirilweng & Tsamaisano ya Didiriswa
profile.backupDesc: Bopa dibekapo tse di nang le khunololamoraba tsa dinotlolo tsa gago, mme o di busetse mo sedirisong se sengwe go tsamaisanya.
profile.privacyBlurEnabled: Swara melaetsa e patilwe ka kaelo
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Pata fa app e sa tsepamwe
profile.notifyOnCopy: Ntsibose fa molaetsa wa me o kopolotswe
profile.unfollowed: O sa tlhole o mo setatelong
profile.unfollowFailed: Go retetse go kgaotsa go latela
profile.followHint: Dipego tsa bone di tla tlhaga mo go Following fa ba romela ka setlhopha sa Balatelwa (kgotsa Sephatlalatsa).
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Go na le sengwe se se sa tsamayang sentle mo karolong eno.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Fetisetsa mehala le melaetsa e e tsenang kwa mo mogaleng kgotsa eposeng ya gago e e netefaditsweng. Mehala/melaetsa e e yang kwa ntle e ka bontsha nomoro ya gago ya Chatforia.
profile.destinationEmail: Aterese ya eposo ya go amogela
profile.destinationPhoneForCalls: Nomoro ya go amogela (E.164) ya mehala

chat.selectPrompt: Tlhopha molaetsa kgotsa phaposi ya puisano go simolola go bua

status.captionPlaceholder: Abelana ka se o se akanyang...
status.filesNote: Go fitlha 5 difaele. Ka tlwaelo di fela ka diura 24.

sidebar.empty: Ga go na dipuisano go fitlha jaanong.

premium.heading: Ntshefatsa (Go Premium)
premium.description: Bula ditshebeletso tse di maatla & tlose dipapatso.

auth.headline: Melaetsa e e sireleditsweng, ya lefatshe ka bophara ka phetolelo ya ka bonako
auth.description: Enkripshene ya bokhutlo-go-ya-bokhutlo, phetolelo e tsamaiswang ke AI, melaetsa e e nyelelang, le mehala ya lentswe/lebidio.

feature.translation: Fetolela dipuo di feta 100 ka boitshediso
feature.disappearing: Melaetsa e e nyelelang & ditshupo tsa go buisiwa
feature.privacy: Poraefete pele. Data ya gago, taolo ya gago.

auth.desktopTip: O mo khomphuteng? Skena ka founo go tsaya app.

headlineAlt.main: Mosele wa melaetsa o o sireletsegileng o

auth.subhead: Melaetsa ya poraefete, e e sireleditsweng, e e fetolelwang — ka pela.
auth.tip: O ka dirisa Chatforia mo sedirisong sengwe le sengwe — kgotsa o tle o itlhafile app.
auth.scanHint: Skena go itelela app kgotsa go bula mo sebrowsereng.

press.title: Boralitaba
press.contact: Go dipotso tsa boralitaba, re ngoke ka press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: Go dipotso tsa boralitaba, re ngoke kwa press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia ke mosele wa melaetsa o o sireletsegileng ka phetolelo ya ka pela le enkripshene ya E2E, o rulagantsweng go dira puisano ya lefatshe ka bophara e nne ya poraefete ebile e se ka mathata.
press.assetsText: Dilogong, dikarolo tsa skrini, le ditshwantsho tsa sehlahisoa (di tlaa tla).

careers.title: Mesebetsi
careers.intro: Re setlhopha se sennye re agile mosele wa melaetsa wa lefatshe ka bophara o o ikaelelang poraefete. Fa o tlhokomela enkripshene, go kgonagala, le UX e e itumedisang, re rata go utlwa ka wena.
careers.openRoles: Dikgapo tse di bulegileng: Boenjiniere (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Sehlahisoa, Tshireletso/Thuso.
careers.apply: Tsela ya go dira kopo: Romela CV/di-link kwa jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Ka ga Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia ke mosele wa melaetsa o o sireletsegileng, o o buang dipuo di le dintsi ka enkripshene ya bokhutlo-go-ya-bokhutlo, phetolelo ya ka pela, le mehala ya lentswe/lebidio. Maikaelelo a rona a motlhofo: go thusa batho go golagana—ka tshireletso, ka poraefete, le mo dipuong tsotlhe.

values.privacy: Poraefete pele: Enkripshene ya E2E ka kaelo.
values.access: Go fitlhelela botlhe: Phetolelo ya boitshediso ya dipuo 100+.
values.control: Taolo: Melaetsa e e nyelelang & ditshupo tsa go buisiwa ke boikgethelo.

about.howDescription: Melaetsa e sirelediwa mo sedirisong sa gago pele e tswa. Phetolelo, dibekapo, le tsamaisano ya didiriswa di rulagantswe go fokotsa se diseravara tsa rona di ka se bonang.

advertise.title: Papatsa ka Chatforia
advertise.description: Fitlha badirisi ba melaetsa ba ba ikaganyeng ka diyuniti tse di nang le tlotlo. Re na le dibenara mo mafelong a a bonalang, ditshegetso, le dipapatso tsa rona. Babereki ba Premium ga ba bone dipapatso.

adsense.withPubId: Gompieno re dirisa Google AdSense. Fa o batla go re lebisa ka Google Ads, dirisa ID ya mopegisi {{pubId}} mme o kope managed placement mo diuniting tse di fa tlase. Ditshegetso tsa tlhamalalo di a gona—dirisa foromo.
adsense.noPubId: Gompieno re dirisa Google AdSense. Ditshegetso tsa tlhamalalo le tsone di a gona—dirisa foromo e e fa tlase.

advertise.noPlacements: Ga go a ise ga bewa mafelo a dipapatso. Akena mo ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Dikopano di le dintsi le nako e telele mo UI ya puisano
why.brandSafe: Diformete tse di sireletsang leina; go laola bonako jwa go ipheta
why.sponsoredMoments: Dinomoro tse di tshegetsweng (mokaloto wa “Simolola Puisano”) di a gona
why.deals: Dikonteraka tsa tlhamalalo kgotsa ka AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Re leboga! Kopo ya gago e rometswe. Re tlaa ikgolaganya ka bonako.
form.successToast: Re leboga! Re tla boela morago kapele.
form.mailtoInfo: Re bula modirisi wa eposo go romela kopo…
form.messageLabel: Re bolelele ka kgaso ya gago
form.messagePlaceholder: Go lebisa, malatsi, KPIs, dikgetho tsa mafelo…

legal.disclaimerStart: Ka go romela, o dumalana le rona

upgrade.title: Ntshefatsa
upgrade.subtitle: Bula leano le le go tshwanetseng: tlosang dipapatso ka Plus, kgotsa tsaya ditshebeletso tsotlhe ka Premium.

scheduleBanner.title: Sengwe sa peeletso se tla fela
scheduleBanner.body: O tla boela mo Mahala ka

features.ringtones: Meriti ya mehala & medumo ya melaetsa e e tlwaelegang
features.powerAi: Dikarolo tsa AI tse di maatla

features.save25: Boloka ~25% go na le ya kgwedi
features.sameFeatures: Dikarolo tse di tshwanang le Ya Kgwedi

gettingStarted.title: Go Simolola
gettingStarted.subtitle: O mosha mo Chatforia? Tataiso eno e go bontsha dintlha tsa botlhokwa gore o nne le thuso ka metsotso.

alert.text: Tataiso eno e tla gola fa re lansa ditiro tse dintsha. Fa go le sengwe se se sa bonaleng, re itsise ka

section1.title: 1) Bopa akhaonto ya gago
section1.loginText: ka akhaonto ya gago e e leng teng.

section2.title: 2) Simolola melaetsa
section2.item1: Bopa DM kgotsa Setlhopha mme o romele molaetsa wa ntlha.
section2.item2: Dirisa phetolelo ya ka pela go bua le dipuo di feta 100.
section2.item3: Leka melaetsa e e nyelelang le ditshupo tsa go buisiwa mo Profailo → Poraefete.

section3.title: 3) Tswelela pele
section3.item1Part2: tsebe (Plus = se na dipapatso, Premium = tsotlhe).
section3.item2Part1: Golaganya didiriswa tse dingwe mme o tlhoma dibekapo tse di sireleditsweng mo

account.q: Ke bopa kgotsa ke busetsa jang akhaonto ya me?
account.a: Itseele app kgotsa dirisa web, tobetsa “Bopa akhaonto”, netefatsa eposo/mogala. Go busetsa, dirisa “O lebetse khunololamoraba”.

privacy.q: A melaetsa e sireleditswe ka bokhutlo-go-ya-bokhutlo?
privacy.a: Ee. Melaetsa le mehala di sireleditswe ka E2E ka kaelo. Ke wena le moamogedi fela ba ka e buang.

translate.q: Phetolelo ya ka pela e dira jang?
translate.a: Bulegisa “Fetolela ka boitshediso” mo Ditlhophiso → Ponalo & Leleme. Re fetolela mo sedirisong fa go kgonega, kgotsa ka di-API tse di sireletsegileng ka metadata e e bannye.

contact.a: Re ngoke kwa support@chatforia.com. Akarelanya ditshwantsho le mofuta wa app.

contact.title: Ikgolaganye le Rona
contact.successMsg: Re leboga—setlhopha sa rona se tla araba ka eposo.
contact.errorSend: Ga e a kgona go romela. Ka kopo romela eposo kwa support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Pholisi eno ya Poraefete e tlhalosa gore Chatforia (“rona”, “re”) re kokoanya, re dirisa, le go abelana ka tshedimosetso fa o dirisa ditiriso le ditshebeletso tsa rona. Re rulaganya Chatforia go fokotsa tshedimosetso e re ka e bonang.

infoWeCollect.title: Tshedimosetso e re e kokoanyang
infoWeCollect.account: Tshedimosetso ya akhaonto (m.e., eposo/mogala) go bopa le go sireletsa akhaonto ya gago.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Dikagare tse di sirilweng (melaetsa/mehala) di E2E; ga re kgone go di buisa.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Dikotsi/tshegetso jaaka log tsa go thubega, mofuta wa sediriso, kgotsa dianalotse tse di bontshang go tokafatsa tshebetso.

howWeUse.title: Re dirisa tshedimosetso jang
howWeUse.provide: Go fana le go sireletsa tirelo (tseno, go lemoga spam/tsenyetso).
howWeUse.improve: Go tokafatsa ditiro (boleng jwa phetolelo, botshepegi).

sharing.title: Go abelana
sharing.body: Ga re rekise tshedimosetso ya botho. Re ka abelana tse di lekanyeditsweng le bareki-mmogo (m.e., dikitsiso, dianalotse) ka dikonteraka tse di tiileng.

rights.title: Ditokelo tsa gago
rights.body: Go ikaegile ka kgaolo ya gago (m.e., GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), o ka kopa go tsena, go lokisa, go phimola, kgotsa go itlhagisa mo ditshebedisong dingwe. Ikgolaganye: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Go boloka data & tshireletso
retention.body: Re boloka fela se se tlhokegang go tsamaisa tirelo mme re dira tshireletso ya maemo a indasteri. Dikagare tsa E2E ga re kgone go di buisa.

children.title: Bana
children.body: Chatforia ga e etselitswe bana ba ba kwa tlase ga dingwaga di le 13 (kgotsa go ya ka molao wa mo lefatsheng la gago).

changes.title: Diphetogo
changes.body: Re tla bega ntšhwafatso fano mme re fetole letsatsi la “Go ntšhwafaditswe go tsa bofelo”.

intro.body: Ka go dirisa Chatforia o dumalana le Dipeelo tseno. Fa o sa dumele, o se ka wa e dirisa.

accounts.title: Diakhaonto
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Naya tshedimosetso e e boammaaruri mme o sireletse dikunolo.
accounts.itemResponsibility: O ikarabela ka sengwe le sengwe mo akhaontong ya gago.

acceptableUse.title: Tiriso e e amogelesegang
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Se romele dikagare tse di seng molaong, tsa go bogisa kgotsa tsa go roba ditokelo; se romele spam kgotsa tlhekefetso e e ikatisang.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Re ka emisa/ema tiriso ka ntlha ya ditlolo.

yourContent.title: Dikagare tsa gago
yourContent.body: O boloka ditokelo mo dikagareng tsa gago. O re naya ditshwanelo tse di tlhokegang go tsamaisa tirelo (m.e., go tsamaisa, polokelo, phetolelo).

disclaimer.title: Boikgogomoso & maikarabelo
disclaimer.body: Tirelo e fiwa “jaaka e ntse” ntle le tiiso. Go ya ka molao, Chatforia ga e ikarabele ka ditshenyegelo tsa tiragalo kgotsa tse di tsenyang bopelotelele.

changes.title: Diphetogo
changes.body: Re ka ntšhwafatsa dipeelo; go tswelela o dirisa morago ga diphetogo go raya go dumalana.

doNotSell.title: Se Rekise kgotsa O Abeleng Tshedimosetso ya Me ya Botho
doNotSell.body: Chatforia ga e rekise tshedimosetso ya botho. Le fa go ntse jalo, banni ba California ba ka tswelela ba romela dikopo go ya ka CPRA ka konopo e e fa tlase.

cookies.title: Dithulaganyo tsa Dikuki
cookies.body: Chatforia e dirisa dikuki tse dinnye (m.e., sedulo, tshireletso). Ga re dirise dikuki tsa dipapatso tse di tswang kwa go ba boraro. Laola dikuki ka dithulaganyo tsa sebrowsera sa gago.
